synopsis.text: Jagaâ€™s thirst for revenge against his old training partner, Mr. Satan, leads him to orchestrate a high-stakes match on his private island. Mr. Satan, accompanied by Android #18, who's eager to collect the debt he owes her, accepts the challenge. Unbeknownst to them, Jaga's scientists have been working on a dangerous project: the resurrection of Broly, the legendary Super Saiyan. Meanwhile, young adventurers Trunks and Goten, intrigued by the unfolding events, join the duo, only to find themselves face-to-face with an unexpected enemy. As the battle intensifies, a vicious liquid leaks from Broly's containment unit, hinting at a looming catastrophe. Will our heroes be able to overcome this powerful foe, or will they succumb to Broly's wrath? Join the adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
